title: Fantasy Q&A + Tilt Hard, Dynasty Download - Fantasy Football Podcast for 1/5
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, questions of all kinds are answered! Week 18 decisions, keeper & dynasty questions, behind the scenes, and more! Plus, Buy or Sell, the latest news, and “Trade For” targets during the Dynasty Download segment! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast -- Fantasy Football Podcast for January 5th, 2022.
  
 (2:50) - Quick Question: What is Dynasty?
 (5:35) - Buy or Sell
 (14:40) - News & Notes
 (25:20) - Mailbag
 (25:40) - Fantasy Football Heartbreak
 (29:30) - Joe Burrow’s 2022 Outlook
 (33:20) - DeAndre Hopkins
 (36:15) - Amon-Ra St. Brown or Elijah Mitchell?
 (37:50) - Michael Carter
 (40:55) - Marvin Jones or Kenyan Drake in Dynasty?
 (43:10) - Kareem Hunt Dynasty Outlook
 (45:35) - Dalvin Cook or Devin Singletary
 (47:55) - Dynasty Download
 (49:15) - Rhamondre Stevenson
 (53:10) - Courtland Sutton
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
